NIBSDescription: Stimulation intensity to evoke MEP of 1 mV.

tms_s1mV.LongName: TMS intensity to evoke MEP of 1 mV
tms_s1mV.Description: Lowest stimulation intensity required to evoke at a mean MEP with a peak-to-peak amplitude about 1 mV at rest over 5 trials, described as a percentage of maximum stimulator output (MSO).

tms_pos_centre.LongName: Position of the centre of the TMS coil.
tms_pos_centre.Description: TMS Coil Position Relative to underlying anatomy.

Levels.LeftM1: Coil center positioned over Left M1 (primary motor cortex).

tms_pos_ydir.Description: The angular direction of the TMS coil handle relative to the midline with handle pointing to posterior.

tms_pulse_direction.Description: Direction of the TMS pulse in the underlying cortex.

Levels.PAAP: Posterior to anterior then anterior to posterior
Levels.APPA: Anterior to posterior then posterior to anterior
